useCase.name: Manage User Research Interviews
useCase.description: As a User Researcher, I want to manage the process of selecting and inviting NSF participants for interviews.

preconditions.precondition: The User Researcher has access to the User Research Management System.
The NSF Staff Database is up-to-date with relevant expertise.

successEndConditions.condition: The User Researcher successfully confirms the RSVPs of selected NSF participants.

failureEndConditions.condition: The User Researcher fails to send invitation emails to selected NSF participants.

useCase.trigger: User Researcher initiates the process of managing user research interviews.

mainSequence.step: User Researcher searches for potential participants based on interview topic.
User Research Management System queries the NSF Staff Database for staff with relevant expertise.
NSF Staff Database returns a list of potential NSF participants to the User Research Management System.
User Research Management System presents potential participants to the User Researcher.
User Researcher selects NSF participants for interviews.
User Research Management System sends invitation emails with interview details to selected participants.
Email System receives the interview invitation.
NSF Person RSVPs to the invitation.
Email System logs the RSVP status.
User Research Management System confirms the RSVPs of selected NSF participants.
